subject: RE: [EVP-ITC] Broadcast Transmitter Capacitors VLF Brand New Variable Capacitors. AM Tuner. Longwave. LOWFERS Very Low Frequency Band Peaking Resonators
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
Or...you could just sweep the tunng by hand.....just a thought.



I get in argument, after argument over the fact that you don't need anything 
exotic, and experiments of mine, and others bear this out.  It's intention 
that matters, that's all.



>From: Ken Thomas <kennnthomas2000@...>
>Reply-To: EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com
>To: Iona Miller <iona_m@...>, evp-itc <EVP-ITC@yahoogroups.com>
>Subject: [EVP-ITC] Broadcast Transmitter Capacitors VLF Brand New Variable 
>Capacitors. AM Tuner. Longwave. LOWFERS Very Low Frequency Band Peaking 
>Resonators
>Date: Fri, 30 Mar 2007 12:16:19 -0700 (PDT)
>
>http://www.stormwise.com/page3.htm
>
>
>   "....Most capacitors of this type go from 20 pF to 365 pF. Our unit will 
>go up to 384 pF. This gives you a little extra room to center the band or 
>tune JUST SLIGHTLY LOWER.
>..."
>
>   REALIGN SUPERHET as quasi TRF  use local oscillator for sweep
